_comment_2: This configuration is TOOL-AGNOSTIC. It defines SDLC methodology settings,
_comment_3: not any specific tool's configuration. Adapt the structure to your tool of choice.
_comment_4: For TinySDLC: save as .sdlc-config.json in project root.
_comment_5: For other tools: use this as a reference for your own configuration format.

roles._comment: Define which roles are active. At LITE tier, one person may fill multiple roles.

pm.description: Product Manager — defines WHAT to build

architect.description: Solution Architect — designs HOW to build it

reviewer.description: Code Reviewer — validates quality and security

teams._comment: Team archetypes. At LITE tier, fullstack is typical.

governance.se4a: AI agents execute tasks, never self-approve
